summary: This module implements a flexible registry system for Ethereum ABI encoding and decoding handlers. It defines core classes for managing collections of coders, predicateâ€‘based lookups, equality checks, and copy support, along with utilities for cache clearing and type analysis.
business_intent: Enable dynamic registration, retrieval, verification and removal of ABI coders based on type predicates, facilitating accurate encoding/decoding of contract data in Ethereum applications.
